schemaMeta.comments: Extension to the LADM that contains SOLA system configuration, business rules and user details.

table.name: Function: consolidation_consolidate
table.comments: Moves records from the temporary consolidation schema into the main SOLA tables. Used by the bulk consolidation process.

table.name: Function: consolidation_extract
table.comments: Extracts records from SOLA that are marked for transfer to another SOLA database.

table.name: Function: get_setting
table.comments: Returns the value for a specified system setting.

table.name: Function: get_text_from_schema
table.comments: Generates a script representing the named SOLA database schema including data held in any tables. Used by the bulk consolidation process

table.name: Function: script_to_schema
table.comments: Used to convert a script generated by get_text_from_schema into a database schema as well as load data into it.
